title: Bitcoin Smashes Through $100,000 Barrier for First Time Ever – Historic Milestone Reached
shortdescription: BTC breaks six-figure price level as institutional demand surges post-election – market cap exceeds $2 trillion.
description: Bitcoin shatters $100K barrier reaching $103,800 ATH — institutional ETF inflows and supply constraints drive historic rally.
author: Emma Chen

title: White House Hosts Key Meeting to Resolve Crypto Market Legislation Stalemate
shortdescription: Banking and crypto leaders meet at White House to resolve stablecoin rewards dispute in the Clarity Act.
description: The White House is bringing together banking and crypto leaders to resolve issues over stablecoin rewards in the Clarity Act. This could shape the future of digital asset regulations in the U.S.
author: Emma Chen

title: Solana Breaks All-Time High at $264 – Overtakes BNB as Third Largest Cryptocurrency
shortdescription: SOL surges 800% in 2024 as meme coins, DeFi, and institutional adoption drive network activity to record levels.
description: Solana hits new ATH at $264 with 800% yearly gain — meme coins and DeFi push network to 5,000 TPS sustained.
author: Emma Chen

title: MicroStrategy Acquires Another 15,000 Bitcoin – Now Holds Over 439,000 BTC Worth $43 Billion
shortdescription: Saylor's company becomes largest corporate Bitcoin holder as MSTR stock outperforms BTC itself in 2024.
description: MicroStrategy adds 15,000 BTC bringing total to 439,000 ($43B) — MSTR stock up 400% as Bitcoin treasury strategy succeeds.
author: Emma Chen
